meta.note: Semua distribusi berbasis langkah‐model (1 step ≈ 1 hari). Nilai berpola asumsi ditandai jelas.

panic_selling_probability.description: Probabilitas borrower menjual panik saat peg < threshold; bentuk right‑skew gebaseerd UST case.
panic_selling_probability.source: Chainalysis blog post on TerraUSD collapse (2022); no direct numeric estimate.

default_probability_shock_multiplier.description: Pengganda NPL saat krisis; skenario sensitivitas.
default_probability_shock_multiplier.source: Scenario assumption; no public IMF paper found.

shock_injection_magnitude.description: Magnitudo de‑peg price shock (USDC 13 % peak; DAI <5 %; excludes Terra‑like 90 % crash).
shock_injection_magnitude.source: CoinMetrics tick data & BIS Bulletin 69 (USDC) – empirically adjacent, but treated as scenario.

stablecoin_jump_frequency.description: Jump count per model‑day calibrated from CoinMetrics price series 2020–2023 (≈ 3 events/yr).
stablecoin_jump_frequency.source: CoinMetrics candle data & Kaiko ‘Defining Depegs’ jump count appendix.

regulator_trigger_threshold.description: Rasio gagal bayar sistemik yang memicu bailout – purely scenario.
